title: A Capable Maid - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   European Ambience   Fallen Nobility   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Jack of All Trades   Master-Servant Relationship   Power Struggle   Righteous Protagonist   Secret Identity   Selfless Protagonist   Special Abilities
author: Yuin   유인
description:
Marie, a half-witted maid who’s not good at anything and had always been bullied, experienced something unbelievable. 

“I want to pray for you. Is there anything you wish of?” 

A miracle came to Marie, after caring for a dying prisoner. 

“I want to be a capable person.” 

From that day on, she begins to have very mysterious dreams! 

Perfect maid! The best sculptor! Genius Musician! 

Through dreaming, she gets the powers of the characters she’s dreaming of! The story of the maid Marie, who is good at everything, begins now. >
